product_name: Jack BlackPure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser
summary: SummaryJack Black's Pure Clean Daily Facial Cleanser is a 2-in-1 liquid cleanser and toner that removes deep-down dirt and oil for clear, smooth, shave-ready skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsWorks gently, without overdrying, to leave your complexion clean, hydrated, and fresh.A combination of cleanser and toner that removes deep-down dirt and oil for clear, smooth, shave-ready skin.Dermatologist TestedCruelty FreeFormulated WithoutSulfatesParabensFragrancesColorantsKey IngredientsOat and Coconut: Natural, sulfate-free surfactants dissolve pore-clogging residue, dirt, and oil.Organic Sage Leaf Extract: Known for providing cleansing and soothing benefits.Chamomile Extract: Soothes, calms, and helps reduce redness.Rosemary Extract: Helps control oiliness and helps fight bacteria on the skin's surface.Witch Hazel: A natural astringent and antioxidant that acts as a toner and provides soothing properties.Organic Aloe Leaf Extract: Helps soothe, calm, and soften the skin.Item 2211503How To UseTo use, apply a nickel size amount to wet hands, work into lather, apply to face. Rinse.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract*, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Backhousia Citriodora Leaf Oil, Hamamelis Virginiana Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, PEG-150 Distearate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium PCA, Citric Acid, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Dehydroacetic Acid, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol.*Certified OrganicAs part of Jack Black's commitment to always offer the highest quality products, some of the ingredients in their formulations may be updated from time to time. The ingredient list shown here may vary from product packaging, depending on the location and timing of purchase.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To use, apply a nickel size amount to wet hands, work into lather, apply to face. Rinse.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid eye contact. If product enters eyes, rinse with water.

reviews.headline: My husband fave
reviews.comments: This is my husband favorite cleanser, light and smells good! Keep the skin moisturized

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love it cleans very well

reviews.headline: Yes I will recommend
reviews.comments: Great product I have tried a couple of different ones and I received the travel set as a gift and really liked the results after using them

reviews.headline: This is a keeper!
reviews.comments: Great facial cleanser for everyday use.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: It made me break out and didn't even leave my face feeling clean :(

reviews.headline: Not shipped with care
reviews.comments: Heavy leakage due to poor packaging.

reviews.headline: Great gifts for men
reviews.comments: Bought twice for my son & he loves it. Jack Black products make great gifts for the men in your life.

reviews.headline: Try this before medication
reviews.comments: I should have written this review a long time ago, but here it is.  My son was struggling with acne that covered most of his face.  We went to see a dermatologist, and of course, they recommended and put him on a certain medication that starts with the letter A( that the filter will not allow me to type in this review. ) After 2 months of seeing what that medication was doing to my son (please research warnings/side effects before putting your child on this) I stopped the medication and searched for a new skin care line to try.  I purchased this cleanser and the face moisturizer to go with it.  I made sure my son used both products morning and night every single day.  Literally, within a couple weeks, his skin was clearing up beautifully.  After a month of use, he had a completely clear, beautiful complexion.  He received complements regularly on how great his skin looked.  It's been 2 years since I purchased our first Jack Black facial products and to this day, my son's skin is flawless. My husband and other son also use JB products.  In my opinion, Jack black products are very cost effective, considering how long they last and how well they work.  I'm not saying it works for everyone, just saying that if you are at the point of considering Acc-----, give this a try first!

reviews.headline: Definitely I would buy it again and continue using it .. my
reviews.comments: Ever since I got it my face has improved a lot .. will recommend this to everyone

reviews.headline: Waste of money
reviews.comments: Bought this for my husband to try. He hated it. I tried it just to see if it was really THAT bad. It's awful, will never buy again. It doesn't cleanse, it smells bad and makes you break out. Don't even bother with this one.

reviews.headline: good
reviews.comments:
works really well!!
after i use it my face feels super clean.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this again!!!!
reviews.comments: I bought for my husband after I read so many good reviews. He used it one week, and then his face has pimples.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I've bought this product at least four times. I will continue to buy it. It cleans my skin very well. It gets rid of all facial oil on the service. Making your skin feel nice and clean.

reviews.headline: A Staple
reviews.comments: An absolute staple in my husband's skin care regimen. Effective, refreshing, and non-drying.

reviews.headline: Burns!
reviews.comments: Product basically burned my face. Used as directed, don't have particularly sensitive skin. Felt and looked like a sunburn. Great reviews and at the price point I assumed a good purchase. Perhaps works for others but a waste of money for me.

reviews.headline: Terrible.
reviews.comments: I thought I couldn't go wrong with the high ratings but this burned my skin terribly and broke me out. I'm still healing from whatever is in this.

reviews.headline: Cleans Well
reviews.comments: This product clenses the skin very well. I have bought it several times. It has a very mild sent. So there basically is no smell after using it. But there is one thing about the tube. If you don't lay it on the side. It goes down to the cap.

reviews.headline: It Works Wonders!
reviews.comments: Nothing bad to say about this product. Great smell, fast acting, feels smooth after use. No complaints here. I would reccomend and I plan on future purchase of this product.

reviews.headline: My husbands favorite cleanser.
reviews.comments: I was able to turn my husband onto skincare with this product. He is old fashioned and didn't care how he cared for the skin on his face meaning he just used regular body soda or shampoo to wash his face until I got him a gift set at Christmas with this product in it and now it is all he will use to wash his face.

reviews.headline: Hubby loves it
reviews.comments: My hubby loves this cleanser and I've used it a few times myself.  Once in a while I try something for him a bit less pricey but he always wants to go back to Jack Black

media.headline: Yes I would buy it again

faceoff_positive.comments: I am writing this because my husband would not sit down to review this although he tells me every day he loves loves loves  Jack Black. My husband is not one to use anything on his face or hands.Once he tried the cleanser after encouragement as I love skin care products, he was hooked. Within in a short period of time, his skin was brighter and he really enjoyed washing his face in the morning, said it was refreshing. He has now expanded his Jack Black products to about everything they offer. He is 69 and his skin looks 10 years younger. He uses his products faithfully now taking a little time for himself and everyone in the family can see the results. Now when special holidays come along, we know what he wants and there are many things to choose from.
faceoff_positive.headline: My husband never used any product untill he tried Jack Black

faceoff_negative.comments: This cleanser was bought as a Christmas gift for my brother because he suffers from acne prone skin and shaving also irritates his skin making him break out. So, I decided to buy this product and so far his skin looks clearer and has a clearer complexion compared to before, he has oily and combination skin so for those that have the same skin type might need to follow up with a good moisturizer in the chin area because he says he tends to get more dryer there, probably because that area is more sensitive from the shaving. But, overall it is a good product and I have no complaints about it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Ok Cleanser...
